an4.201:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,
an4.201:4.2: a good person and a better person.
an4.201:4.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an4.201:5.2: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an4.201:5.3: This is called a bad person.
an4.201:6.1: And what is a worse person?
an4.201:6.2: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcohol and drugs that cause negligence. And they encourage others to do these things.
an4.201:7.1: And what is a good person?
an4.201:7.2: It’s someone who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an4.201:7.3: This is called a good person.
an4.201:8.1: And what is a better person?
an4.201:8.2: It’s someone who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence. And they encourage others to avoid these things.
